chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 Pro and it has the above problem:

I couldn't apply the discount code during the entire ordering process. There was once a field that had the code, but it didn't accept it.

Thank you for your help,

Hello, 
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: 
Why can't I cancel my order anymore.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

please cancel the order.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

please continue the order.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and will continue with the order.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Dear Backcare,

Regards,
JY
